verbose_text: The total 20 PU (9.9 x 10 11 transfused platelets) increased platelet count with a percentage of platelet recovery approaching 100% but failed to reverse ticagrelor induced platelet inhibition, as both VASP and VerifyNow-P2Y 12 values remained below thresholds.
evidence:
